page.title: 04CARLESS OIL REFINERY
page.content: The{refinery}is an important piece of {industry}in the area, and a large number of local people are employed there. As well as dealing with certain aspects of the oil industry, it was explained to us that a whole range of chemicals and additives are produced at the site.We were surprised to find that the company has its own Private {Railway}to move the tanks about. The storage tanks seem to be enormous,especially when we were standing on top of them or crossing over the catwalks.The rules about smoking and the{fire}warning signs were all over the place, and they have their own fire house. The refinery deals with all{European {countries}and belongs to a large company which has many other similar places around the world.
